entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.7°C

Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

Temperature: -9.7°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 91 %

Dewpoint: -10.9°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9 with temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
